overview: Alan Garvey was born in the humble Carlos Gardel neighborhood, where he grew up knowing and understanding a daily life mired in marginality, with its codes, its blind alleys and forced social injustice. Since he was ten years old, he has painted, acted and made music, almost as an alternative to living with a particular reality. Today, at twenty, he has a debut album and directs his first short with Ca칩tico, in which he crudely and intelligently captures his private world, illustrated in gestures of gang camaraderie, intense nocturnal trips and a flow huge.
title: Ca칩tico
